__e: Oh, my god... rodney, what's happening to me?
You're "take your mama to church every Sunday" Rodney?
I do have a friend called Rodney, though, and Rodney would love to meet the players, wouldn't you, mate?
I know it's ridiculous, but I feel like the Reverend Rodney King Jr., you know?
Okay. Do you remember a man named Rodney King?
If Danny was walking across the street that night... and Rodney King plowed into him-
I don't know that much about it, but my guess is, Rodney went up there to fight.
Rodney, it's being held together by a force field.
Two months ago, Rodney Harwood came into my E.R. With a gunshot wound, and something I did...
Rodney didn't tell you what happened.
All I'm saying is that if Rodney can't turn to you, who can he turn to?
I just said you seemed nervous. Oh really...
